# proximity

**Instance Property**

A value indicating how a location-based alarm is triggered.

## Declaration

```swift
var proximity: EKAlarmProximity { get set }
```

## Discussion

Alarms can be set to trigger when entering or exiting a location specified by [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/structuredLocation]. By default, alarms are not affected by location.

## Setting GeoFence-based Alarms

- **EKAlarmProximity**: A value indicating whether an alarm is triggered by entering or exiting a region.
- **structuredLocation**: The location to trigger an alarm.
